medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started as diffuse abdominal pain primarily in the right upper quadrant (RUQ) and have now migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The pain has persisted for 3 days with no nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, fever, or chills. The patient still has an appetite, last eating this morning, and has normal bowel movements.
